articles.title: This Day in History: 50th anniversary of the passing of Title IX - WMUR Manchester
articles.description: Today marks 50 years since Title IX was passed into American law. Learn about the history of the bill.
articles.content:
Former U.S. President Richard Nixon signed Title IX into law on June 23, 1972.
